channel.title: Video Tutorials
channel.description:
I have been creating video tutorials for various languages; Java being one of them.
The below link you will take you to my YouTube account where you will find the video tutorials for free. I have a few different languages (Java, C++, PHP, HTML, CSS) and I will continue to make more tutorials.
I have created a site for these tutorials, and for programmers. But I don't want to directly link to that, so you will need to figure that out yourself.
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/user/letsprogram]Let's Program YouTube[/URL]
Thanks, and please comment on what you think.

item.title: Video Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Yeah I realized that when super_ had mentioned it.

Read full topic

item.title: Video Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“oksuper_, post:2, topic:313033”]‘getters and setters’ are called accessor methods; they aren’t there to be ‘professional’, they are there to encapsulate fields and are used to implement things called properties… java ee uses them extensively.[/quote]true this ^ - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaBean

Read full topic

item.title: Video Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Dumke_AtomicFury Dumke[AtomicFury]
item.description:
@Dumke_AtomicFury wrote:

oh great this looks good, have you got one on html?

Read full topic

item.title: Video Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Haha, alright. If you see anything wrong and wouldn’t mind sharing either in a comment or post here. That would be great and I could learn some more as well as others who watch them.

Yeah, I always liked video tutorials; I myself am a visual learner.

PS: I also have a twitter: http://twitter.com/letsprogram
As well I supply all the files here: http://files.letsprogram.org, It contains things like tutorial sources and just whatever else i feel like adding. (The shooter series on the files is different from in the videos, because I had to rewrite it due to me losing the previous files).

Read full topic

item.title: Video Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

there are a few personal issues but other than that, i like. i thought the 2d shooter game series was intriguing, and it made me wonder why i didnt watch any video series similar to that when i was a noob.

Read full topic

item.title: Video Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Thanks for posting the link, I didn’t want to because they contain forums. Wasn’t sure if that was allowed so thanks

I’m not saying they are the best, because I know they aren’t. I’m just starting to make tutorials and I still have things to learn in programming too. I just like to help out.

oksuper_:

‘getters and setters’ are called accessor methods; they aren’t there to be ‘professional’, they are there to encapsulate fields and are used to implement things called properties… java ee uses them extensively.

Oh, alright thanks.

Read full topic
